snippet: Fans who go to the Seminoles’ game this weekend can take their guns — if they have a concealed-weapons permit and they keep the weapons locked in their cars.
abstract: Florida State football fans are allowed to take their guns to upcoming game as long as they have concealed-weapons permit and keep weapons locked in their cars; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Fans who go to the Seminoles’ game this weekend can take their guns — if they have a concealed-weapons permit and they keep the weapons locked in their cars.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
